name: spa-check
description: Automated testing for single-page applications (SPAs). Small, portable, and easy to use. Click on things, fill in values, await for things exist, etc.

scripts.build: ./node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc --target es6 --lib es2015,dom,dom.iterable spa-check.ts && ./node_modules/minify/bin/minify.js spa-check.js > spa-check.min.js && node utils/make-blob.mjs && ./node_modules/minify/bin/minify.js spa-check.blob-uncompressed.js > spa-check.blob.js && npm run build:cleanup && node utils/make-template.mjs && npm run test:update

author: Cory Leigh Rahman
